index.title: Maria & Ivan
index.welcomeText: We can't wait to celebrate with you.
index.detailsText: More details and a formal invitation to follow.
index.ceremonyText: Our ceremony begins at the church. Follow the signs to the center and the church.
index.receptionText: Around 16:00 the couple arrives at the venue for dinner and party. The venue is about one kilometer from the church.
index.infoOneText: Starter, main course, and wedding cake. Drinks are served during dinner and at the bar.
index.infoTwoText: A limited number of beds are available at the venue. If you would like to stay overnight, please RSVP as early as possible so we can reserve a spot for you. We have the venue booked from June 25–29. If demand exceeds capacity, we will reach out and gladly help you find comfortable accommodation nearby.
index.infoThreeText: Dark and elegant is the vibe. Gentlemen, think dark suits with a crisp shirt and tie or bow tie. Ladies, an elegant dress—ideally in darker tones. Save the bright and flashy colors for another party; this look is about timeless evening glamour.
index.infoFourText: If you need help getting from Odense to the venue, please contact us and we will do our best to assist.
index.rsvpCtaText: Use your invitation code to access the RSVP form.
